Metro Fibre Projects


*Click on the IMAGE above to view project pictures*


- Oukrall Houses

Fault finding, fixed faults, and power meter results provided at 1490nm and 1550nm on 80 units. Total of 160 results for client.

- Oukrall Apartments

Fault finding on existing backbone, fixed faults, respliced Headend, powermeter readings provided at 1490nm and 1550nm on 240 apartment units. Total of 480 results for client.

- Hazel Meadows Complex

Prepped and spliced Headend splitter and patch panels. Prepped and spliced 68 termination boxes. Powermeter readings provided at 1490nm and 1550nm on 190 townhouse units. Total of 380 results for client.

- Pebble Lane Complex

Prepped and spliced Headend splitter and patch panels. Prepped and spliced 32 termination boxes. Powermeter reading provided at 1490nm and 1550nm on 85 townhouse units. Total of 170 results for client.

- Marula Complex

Prepped and spliced 5 dome joints of feeder cable. Installed drop cables. Prepped and spliced 48 termination boxes. Powermeter reading provided at 1490nm and 1550nm on 95 complex units. Total of 190 results for client.
